registration.title: Registration
registration.text: Please, fill out the form bellow to use the platform

form.name: Name
form.termsCheckbox: I have read and agree with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

validation.termsCheckbox: You must agree with the terms and privacy policy

password.number: Password must have at least one digit
password.lowercase: Password must have at least one lowercase letter
password.uppercase: Password must have at least one uppercase letter
password.special: Password must have at least one special character

exception.email: There was a problem with the email used

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Get in touch using the form below

yup.invalid_field_length: This field must have at least ${min} characters
yup.invalid_number_length: This field should be bigger than ${min}.
yup.mixed_max: This field should be smaller than ${max}.
yup.mixed_min: This field should be bigger than ${min}.
yup.string_email: This field needs to be a valid email.
yup.string_max: This field should be smaller than ${max}.
yup.string_min: This field should be bigger than ${min}.
yup.number_max: This field should be smaller than ${max}.
yup.number_min: This field should be bigger than ${min}.

resendEmail.title: Resend email
